text: Good {time_of_day}, kind faithful! Have you need of the *elevator*?
Good {time_of_day}, kind faithful! Have you need of the elevator? (This game makes use of keywords for dialog. Here, you can type 'yes' or 'no' to answer Dmitri's question.)
I am a wizard of *Nertus*, kind faithful. I serve both She and our *king* however they bless me.
In this moment, I serve in this elevator. I pray to Her that it may move, and She graces my requests.
Perhaps not the most glamorous role, but we are all clay to the *Eight*s' potters. Besides, I enjoy the silence. Wonderful as my children are, they can be... much.
The Gods of Sewinso, of which *Nertus* is but one. Beyond this, I cannot say much more outside a *temple*. It is not my place.
Temples are where those weary of body or soul may find respite. They are also where, if prayed for by a head priest and one of the king's favor, the body and soul may be connected once more.
Even if you are not weary, there can be much to learn from the priests and wizards teaching there.
There is, of course, a temple here in Kesvelt, on the *ground* floor. Would you like to visit?
Nertus is one of the *Eight*. You may know Her as the God of stone and metal, perhaps of the Earth itself. Reductive, but She is not so tempremental as some.
Do you wish to earn her favor, kind faithful?
Excellent! I can take you to the archmage's *lab* at once! He'll be able to help you.
Yes? Yes to what?
A shame.
Where would you like to go, then? Or is there something you wish to discuss?
No? No what?
Kua stein. Kua stein.
Alkua stein. Kua stein.
We have arrived.
Do not hesitate to make use of my services in the future. It is an honor to serve my king and his faithful.

confirm: Very well. Sit then, and *pray* with me.
deny: I don't know where that is, kind Faithful.
already_here: We are already here, kind Faithful.
